00009 #ifdef __OBJC__
00010 
00015 #pragma once
00016 #ifndef __X2D_CALLBACK_H__
00017 #define __X2D_CALLBACK_H__
00018 
00019 #include <boost/function.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/bind.hpp>
00021 
00022 static boost::function<void()> objc_callback(SEL sel, id obj)
00023 {
00024     typedef void (*func)(id, SEL);
00025     func impl = (func)[obj methodForSelector:sel];
00026     return boost::bind(impl, obj, sel);    
00027 }
00028 
00029 template<typename T>
00030 static boost::function<void(T)> objc_callback_1(SEL sel, id obj)
00031 {
00032     typedef void (*func)(id, SEL, T);
00033     func impl = (func)[obj methodForSelector:sel];
00034     return boost::bind(impl, obj, sel, _1);    
00035 }
00036 
00037 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00038 static boost::function<void(T1,T2)> objc_callback_2(SEL sel, id obj)
00039 {
00040     typedef void (*func)(id, SEL, T1, T2);
00041     func impl = (func)[obj methodForSelector:sel];
00042     return boost::bind(impl, obj, sel, _1, _2);    
00043 }
00044 
00045 #endif // __X2D_CALLBACK_H__
00046 #endif // __OBJC__
